properties.areaDesc: Ritchie, WV; Calhoun, WV; Roane, WV; Wirt, WV; Gilmer, WV
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 4:36PM EST until January 11 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Calhoun County in north central West Virginia...
Southern Ritchie County in northwestern West Virginia...
Gilmer County in north central West Virginia...
Southeastern Wirt County in northwestern West Virginia...
Northern Roane County in central West Virginia...

* Until 500 PM EST.

* At 435 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from 6 miles south of Elizabeth to near Spencer to 12
miles east of Kenna, moving east at 55 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Spencer, Glenville, Grantsville, Arnoldsburg, Cedar Creek State
Park, Sand Fork, Auburn, Shock, Millstone, Cherry, Smithville,
Mount Zion, Newberne, Lucille, Big Springs, Berea, Brohard,
Stumptown, Tanner and Macfarlan.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Please report severe weather to the National Weather Service by
calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.

You may also report severe weather by posting your report to the
Charleston West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or
by using the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.
